entry.title: Black Buddha Journal
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Journals
Price: 12.00

Daphne shrub paper for centuries has been used for manuscripts and traditional medicine. Our handmade paper products are made from the bark of Daphne shrub which grows in the mountains of Nepal. Known Locally as Lokta the scrub grows at an altitude of 6500 to 9500 feet. The Lokta scrub regenerates after cutting, thus preserving the fragile forest ecology of Nepal. It has exceptional strength with very appealing texture and it is one of the most Eco-friendly paper in the world.

composition: 100% Handmade natural paper.
Artwork: screen printed



Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
